reviewsJson.markdown:
**Specs:**

- percentage used: 2%
- 2 months
- PG/VG ratio: 50/50
- vaped on NarDA rda, SS316L, 26 gauge, 2.5 ID, contact coil, 0.81 ohm, 12-20 watts

**Type of Tobacco:**

- non-aromatic

**Flavor Properties:**

- earthy
- dark
- bold
- not sweet

**Relatable Flavors:**

- green vegetal flavor (again, like green tea or not quite dried forest leaves)
- some spice
- TFA Cubano (charred green pepper is the only way I know how to describe it)
- not getting cocoa like other users report
- definitely not smokey like some also report

**Mouth Feel:**

- medium density

**Off Flavors:**

- none

**Position In A Recipe:**

- accent

**Suggested Percentage:**

- 1-2%

**Pairings:**

- tobaccos of choice (I'd go with dark tobaccos)

**Conclusion:**

- To me, this is super similar to FA Latakia
- Many report cocoa notes but I don't get that at all
- This isn't a profile I would reach for often, if at all and if I had to choose, I'd go for FA Latakia.

**Second Opinion**

TexasHex seems to like this one.. 

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/4orpyk/dark_vapurefa/
reviewsJson.author: T_Mace
reviewsJson.title: Dark Vapure
